hits.definition:
派

[pài] faction, send;

    党派 dǎngpài political parties

[pā] 派司 pāsi passport, identification

李

[lǐ] (= 李子 lǐzi) plum, <family name>

息

[xī] breath, stop

[xi]

    消息 xiāoxi news;

    休息 xiūxi rest

呢

[ne] <sentence final particle>

[ní] woolen cloth

令

[lìng] make, cause; 命令 mìnglìng command

[lǐng] ream, <classifier for paper>

[líng] 脊令 jílíng (= 鹡鸰 jílíng) wagtail (a symbol of brotherly friendship)

黄 (F 黃)

[huáng] (= 黄色 huángsè) yellow

脸 (F 臉)

[liǎn] face

钱 (F 錢)

[qián] money, copper coin

倒

[dǎo] fall down, topple

[dào] invert, (move) backwards, pour, contrary to expectations

[dáo] follow up
